Introducing Curtain: The Ultimate Content Control Extension

In today’s digital world, controlling what you see online can enhance your productivity, focus, and even protect your well-being. Whether you’re looking to eliminate distractions, reduce eye strain, or simply have a more tailored browsing experience, Curtain is here to help.

Key Features

Hide Images, Videos, SVGs, and Backgrounds:
	•	With Curtain, you can easily toggle the visibility of images, videos, SVGs, and even background images on any webpage. This helps in decluttering your view and focusing on the content that matters most to you.
Greyscale Mode:
	•	Enable the greyscale filter to turn all visual elements on a webpage into greyscale. This can reduce eye strain and help in creating a distraction-free environment.
Easy Control Panel:
	•	Curtain features an intuitive and sleek control panel that allows you to manage your settings effortlessly. Simply click the Curtain icon in your browser to access the panel and toggle your preferences.
Persistent Settings:
	•	Your settings are saved per website, so you don’t have to reconfigure them every time you visit. Curtain remembers your choices and applies them automatically.
Minimalist Design:
	•	The control panel is designed to be unobtrusive and easy to use, with a dark theme that blends seamlessly with any webpage.
Safe:
        •	Curtain runs fully locally.

Curtain is designed to be user-friendly and efficient. From installation to daily use, every aspect of the extension aims to provide a seamless and empowering experience. Whether you’re a professional needing to eliminate distractions or someone looking to control their visual environment, Curtain adapts to your needs.

Experience the web the way you want with Curtain – your personal content controller.

Support the Development:
If you find Curtain useful, consider supporting its development through the donation link in the control panel.

Curtain - Simplify, Focus, Control.
